text: Hige'na anampinkama ufre'na koana, ana nomofo agu'afina rugaraga asoparega ruzahu ruzahu zagama zamasaguregati'ma regrarohe'zama vanoma nehaza zagaramimofo amema'ane, agru osu zagaramimofo amema'aramine, Israeli vahe'moma kaza osu havi anumzama mono'ma hu'nentaza anumzantmimofo amema'aramine tro hunte'za evu'nazage'na ke'noe.
